text:
Anne Gwendolyn Craig (born 20 June 1934), known professionally as Wendy Craig, is an English actress. She is best known for her roles in the sitcoms "Not in Front of the Children", "...And Mother Makes Three"/"...And Mother Makes Five" and "Butterflies".
She played the role of Matron in the TV series "The Royal" (2003–2011).

annotations.surface_form: Not in Front of the Children
